cast.name: 金伯利·斯特沃特 Kimberly Stewart

this_title: Fine: Industrial Is Dead Feat. Ashley Hamilton
introduction: Singer Ashley Hamilton is confronted by several girlfriends, including one played by real life half-sister Kim Stewart. He doesn't have very much regard for the women, and chooses to read books instead. The frustrated women find a way to exact revenge on their unsympathetic lover. They find him in a dark alley, knock him out and drag him to a science laboratory, where an operation is done on him. He wakes up in an alley, transformed into a woman. He touches his chest, noticing his new breasts. He looks at his long fingernails and shudders. Suddenly he has a new appreciation for what it's like to walk in high heels as he wobbles away down the alley. One of the women gives a knowing look to the camera.
chinese_title: Fine: Industrial Is Dead Feat. Ashley Hamilton
